result.execSummary:
The defendant Hanifa L Kristine was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Hanifa L Kristine is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Hanifa L Kristine was found guilty of Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).
  • Hanifa L Kristine was found guilty of Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Each ct concur.
12/9/15 Crt orders that the def has a total of 49 days credit (prev 0)

miscConds.notes: $200 DNA surcharge remitted. $443  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
$164.50 Civil filing fee pursuant to sec. 814.61(1)(d) & (e) and $40 service fee pursuant to sec. 814.70(1) from case 15CV1078.

Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with EFJ, EK or CJ or any school EFJ attends. Banned from City of Monona, Dane County, Wisconsin.

Appoint Mental Health agent if possible. GPS monitoring for first 6 mo and if appropriate, any other time during length of probation. Maintain stable residence. Take all medications as prescribed and follow recommendations of health care providers.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.
$443  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
$164.50 Civil filing fee pursuant to sec. 814.61(1)(d) & (e) and $40 service fee pursuant to sec. 814.70(1) from case 15CV1079.

Referral to Bail Monitoring

Report of Dr. Knudson found defendant competent. Defendant anda Atty Burke agreed with competency finding.  State did not contest finding.  Court found defendant competent and lifted stay of proceedings.  Court amended bond.

CASH BOND SET - TO REVERT TO A SIGNATURE BOND - REFERRAL TO BMP
- Cash bail is set at $1,000 per case. This case bail shall revert to a signature bond on July 17, 2015 at 10:00 a.m. in the amount of $1,000 per case. Defendant must immediately report to DCBM.
- If the defendant fails to comply with Dane County Bail Monitoring, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $1,000 per case, as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. If Defendant posts this higher amount of bail and is released from jail, the Sheriff is directed to notify DCBM. If Defendant is out of custody, supervision by DCBM is required to enforce conditions of release and protect the public.The Defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail. Defendant is ordered to cooperate with DCBM.
- Defendant must be on GPS.
- Defendant shall take all medications as prescribed and follow doctor's orders.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Emily K. or Curtis J. or E.F.J.
- Defendant is banned from the City of Monona, WI.
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $1,000 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
Trial Judge -  Br 5
Competency examination report from Dr. Eric Knudson, M.D.
Competency hearing on July 17, 2015 at 09:00 am.
